notes.description: Configuration for Excel column search script - OPTIMIZED VERSION
notes.name: Optional: A descriptive name for the rule (for tracking in logs)
notes.search_column: The column to search for the first target value
notes.search_value: The value to find in the search_column
notes.check_column: The column to check when search_value is found
notes.check_value: The value to find in the check_column for a complete match
notes.enabled: Set to false to disable a rule without deleting it
notes.multiple_rules: You can add unlimited rules. Rules with the same column pairs are processed together for speed.
